question: This state has been announced as the Most Film Friendly State for its efforts towards easing filming in the state.
explanation: Madhya Pradesh has been announced as the Most Film Friendly State for its efforts towards easing filming in the state. MP has offered excellent on ground support, filmic infrastructure, an informative website and incentives for filmmaking. The jury for selecting the Most Film Friendly State Award 2017 was chaired by acclaimed filmmaker Ramesh Sippy.
